mapper.update: INSERT INTO book_total(uuid,two_level_college,major,grade,course_title,xqid,create_time,cla,submit_state) SELECT replace(md5(uuid()),"-","") as uuid, c.two_level_college as two_level_college, c.major as major, c.grade as grade, c.course_title as course_title, c.xqid as xqid, now() as create_time, s.cla as cal, "0" as submit_state FROM curriculum_plan c LEFT JOIN (select * from student_info group by student_info.cla) s ON c.major = s.major WHERE c.grade = s.grade and c.xqid = #{xqid} order by s.cla
